== Team Structure ==

This page is the official structure for the Ubuntu Studio <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net|launchpad]]</nowiki> teams. It will reflect the current state of the teams and clearly define the roles of each member. It is to be used as a reference for current and new members. 

Want to become a team member? Want to help out with development? Check out <nowiki>[[UbuntuStudio-JoinTheTeam|This Page]]</nowiki>.

The organization of the teams is related to the design of launchpad, which we use for keeping track of planning and development, in the form of <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/ubuntustudio|source]]</nowiki>, and <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntustudio|blueprints]]</nowiki>. Only active members are listed here, and only for those teams where it is useful to do so (ubuntustudio-user and ubuntustudio-bugs are two open teams that do not require any participation).

| moderated team for those wanting to become Ubuntu Studio developers
|-
| <#A0D2D9> <nowiki>[[UbuntuStudio-PRSupportTeamPage|Public Relations and Support team ]]</nowiki>
| <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntustudio-public-relations|~ubuntustudio-public-relations]]</nowiki>

|-
